structure.unit: Regulations And By Laws Relative To Ways And Bridges

law.catch_line: Approval Of Name For Way Other Than Public Way In City Or Town
law.text: No way in any city or town which is open for public use but has not become a public way shall be given a name unless the same is first approved by its board of survey, or, if there is no such board, its board of aldermen or board of selectmen.
